[COLOR="#00FF00"][SIZE=3] - 24/7 -Dual Weilding! -Eoc Skins/Items - No lag - Stable Economy - 100% Uptime - Perfect hit formula for melee, range and magic - 138 combat, summoning counts - Constant Updates - Professional and active Staff - Active Clean Forums - Old and new Runescape Armor - DonatorZone (with shops) - Loyalty point system with shop (300 points every 30mins) - Various shops. - Squeal of fortune. - Bone's on altar. - Friendly staff. - Hunter. - All the GodWars Dungeons. - Fully working Nex. - Curses, ancients etc. - Quests to be added soon. - Working Revenants. - Queen Black Dragon - Fight Kiln - Fight Caves - Custom Dung! - Working chaotics - Working Flowers and Dicing - Money pouch Of course - 25/25 working skill's! - Working clan wars! - Great staff and owner's! - fully working slayer and slayer tower! - Awesome Home - Great PvP and switching - Owner takes all ideas into consideration. - Perfect switching - unique home - & So much more![/SIZE][/COLOR]
